title: Criticism of the Western Civ.. - C.58 (Cults, New Religions 3)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 58 (Cults, New Religions 3):

We have 21 titles here:

-  Abanes - Defending the Faith; a Beginner's Guide to Cults and New Religions (1997)

-  Aragon - The Forbidden Religion (2007)

-  Black & Hyatt - Pacts with the Devil (1993)

-  Bortolotii - Delusions and Other Irrational Beliefs (2010)

-  Christie - Property; the True Story of a Polygamous Church Wife (2013)

-  Cowan & Bromley - Cults and New Religions; a Brief History, 2e (2015)

-  Dan - Kabbalah; a Very Short Introduction (2006)

-  Elliott - Warrior Cults; a History of Magical, Mystical and Murderous Organizations (1995)

-  Galinier & Molinie - The Neo-Indians; a Religion for the Third Millennium (2013)

-  Gilmore - The Satanic Scriptures (2007)

-  Greer - The New Encyclopedia of the Occult (2003)

-  Jessop & Palmer - Triumph; Life After the Cult - a Survivor's Lessons (2011)

-  Lewis (Ed.) - The Order of the Solar Temple; the Temple of Death (2006)

-  McDowell & Stewart - The Occult; The Authority of the Believer over the Powers of Darkness (1992)

-  Moore et al (Eds.) - Peoples Temple and Black Religion in America (2004)

-  Musser & Cook - The Witness Wore Red; the 19th Wife Who Brought Polygamous Cult Leaders to Justice (2013)

-  Partridge (Ed.) - The Occult World (2015)

-  Scholem - Origins of the Kabbalah (1962)

-  Webb - The Occult Underground (1974)

-  Weyermann - Answer Them Nothing; Bringing Down the Polygamous Empire of Warren Jeffs (2011)

-  Williams & Robinson (Eds.) - Scientism; the New Orthodoxy (2015)
